howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple and secure process to schedule your in-person vaccination

step1.title: Choose the service
step1.description: Browse the website and choose the vaccines you or your family need

step2.title: Schedule your appointment
step2.description: Contact us to schedule on the best day and time for you

step3.title: Visit our clinic
step3.description: Come on the scheduled day and time to receive your vaccination with comfort and safety

step4.title: Payment method
step4.description: We accept Pix, Cash, Credit and Debit Cards, or Payment Link

howItWorks.noHomeVisits: We do not provide home visits

vaccines.title: Available Vaccines

vaccines.notFound: Couldn't find the vaccine you're looking for? Contact us!

benefit1.title: Ensure complete protection
benefit1.description: With our service, you can get vaccinated safely and conveniently

benefit2.title: Simplify scheduling
benefit2.description: With the vaccine plan, you already have all vaccines scheduled and doses reserved to be administered on the correct date

plan.ctaText: Contact us to learn about benefits and special conditions
